        public InterNeuron(int ID,
                   int samplingRate,
                   double tauInhibitory,
                   double threshold,
                   double refractoryPeriod)
        Parameters:
        ID - id of this inhibitory interneuron
        samplingRate - sampling rate
        tauInhibitory - tau value for the compartment that will implement this inhibitory interneuron
        threshold - threshold for neuron
        refractoryPeriod - refractory period in seconds
